guide.title: adventurers_guide65_asmo_sm
guide.message:
 :: Armor Pack :: 
===============================
***


You have made it! You have ascended to the original high ranking of the Asmodians order. You have, no doubt, mastered the lands of Asmodae and the Abyss, but this is far from the end.

Balaurea awaits you, drenched in wonder and pure evil. Please take these rewards as a token of congratulations thus far on your journey, but you will need them!

On behalf of the entire Server staff, enjoy the rewards. Please recommend us!
